description.@en: Glowering over your hated enemies, your eyes sear with green rays of light, blinding those whom behold your sickening countenance.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, foes caught in its Cone Template suffer [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] mental Peril. In addition, they must Resist with a successful Awareness Test or be made Defenseless until their next Turn.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but foes cannot Resist this spell.

criticalFailure.@en: Your eyes burn with a terrible light as you are captivated by visions of your own destruction. You are made Defenseless until your next Turn and suffer from Fear.

reagents.@en: A monocle made from Wytchstone, worn
